entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Configuration Binding inconsitent handling of initial values for unset options #94814
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Abstractions 8.0.0 miss net7.0 TFM #94812
  • [mono][wasi] Set the minimal set of FeatureFlags by default #94805
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasi] Optional wasm-opt pass #94804
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasi] WASI size improvements #94803
    9.0.0
  • XUnitLogChecker: Consolidate duplicated properties in coreclr and libraries into one place #94802
  • Could not use CreateFromEncryptedPemFile to load certificates when using dotnet 7 in FIPS environment. #94800
  • ILC and ILLink don't respect TrimmerSingleWarn in some cases #94799
  • NetworkInformationException: Permission denied (.NET 8 + Docker +GCloud) #94794
  • crossgen2 fails on FIPS enabled systems (due to MD5 hashing) #94786
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry(_ctxBase.Path, _credentials, _authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94781
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry(_ctxBase.Path, _credentials, _authTypes) becomes out of scope and is not disposed #94780
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry(_ctxBase.Path, _credentials, _authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94779
  • new DirectoryEntry(nativeMember) becomes out of scope and is not disposed #94777
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry("LDAP://" + dnsDomainName + "/" + GetEscapedDN(distinguishedName), this.Credentials, this.authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94776
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry( "LDAP://" + this.dnsHostName + "/" + this.defaultNamingContext, this.credentials, this.authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94775
  • new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Domain) is not disposed at the end of the function #94774
  • new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Machine) is not disposed at the end of the function #94772
  • Domain.GetComputerDomain() is not disposed at the end of the function #94771
  • VS 17.8 MS testhost.exe crashing on .NET 8 with Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #94770
  • RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds in Blazor WebAssembly 8.0.0 #94773
  • Slow thread suspension in busy loop #94767
  • Escaped pattern in the summary of GeneratedRegex #94760
  • new RangeRetriever(groupDE, "member", false) is not disposed at the end of the function #94755
  • [VIRTUAL] Value link._sites.de, which has null value, is dereferenced inside function link.Sites #94754
  • Value (List<string>)value, which can have null value due to comparison with null, is dereferenced inside function _servicePrincipalNames.Load(). #94753
  • Apartment threaded IDispatch server throws `InvalidOperationException` or fails to marshal #94749
  • Support `Type.GetMember` usage analysis properly with IL3050 warning (NAOT) #94745
  • .NET7 NativeAOT worked for us right before updating today to .NET8, now NativeAOT is breaking on an error. #94744
    9.0.0
  • Vector512 CopyTo<T>(this Vector512<T> vector, T[] destination, int startIndex) incorrect #94743
  • Test failure _Avx512F_VL_Vector256_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F_VL_Vector256.Program.RoundScaleSingle0() #94739
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [Performance] String.IndexOf(StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) regressed 20% in .NET 8 #94713
  • dotnet publish with RID pull latest runtime packages and can fail #94763
  • [wasi] Improve error message for missing WASI SDK #94671
  • Performance Regression with .NET 8 (inlining seems broken in multiple conditions) #94750
  • Blazor WASM application migration from dotNet7 to dotNet8 #94806
  • .net6 custom string and long converters do not take effect #93385
  • JsonSerializer doesn't correctly deserialize readonly structs #94443
  • NullReferenceException sometimes in System.Text.Json on iOS/MAUI #93967
  • Add a TryGetOrCreate or other mechanism for safely indicating value isn't ready yet #36553
    Future
  • Native crash on System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn4.4.Tests net8.0-linux-Debug-arm64-Mono_release #88102
  • DateTimeOffset.Now throws exception on Android with Arabic language & western hemisphere timezone #94709
    8.0.x
  • DecryptContent(RecipientInfoCollection recipientInfos, X509Certificate2Collection? extraStore) should throw AggregateException #94769
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!(block->bbFlags & BBF_FINALLY_TARGET)' during 'Global local var liveness' #94680
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT iOS/osx/tvos legs are timing out on many PRs #93784
  • ExperimentalAttribute and ObsoleteAttribute are reported in non-consistent way #94761
  • Why DOTNET_GCHeapHardLimitPercent not working? #92113
    Future
  • GetOrCreateAsync will always execute the inner method and will cache the result! #54422
    Future
  • MemoryCache looses entries when SetEntry results in exceeding capacity. #61495
    Future
  • Add extension method to help set DI injectable `MemoryCache` with enabled statistics tracking ability #67769
    Future
  • MemoryCache PostEvictionCallback unexpectedly using the wrong ILogger scope #69428
    Future
  • Revisit MemoryCache design #36556
    Future
  • Need more Get function in the Cache class #36559
    Future
  • Allow direct access to ICacheEntry and make it thread safe #36498
    Future
  • Async work started in ICacheEntry scope can keep the entry alive longer than needed #42992
    Future
  • Multi-level cache #35044
    Future
  • IDistributedCache Support for `Collection` #36095
    Future
  • Make IMemoryCache fully generic to avoid boxing #48455
    Future
  • Windbg breakpoints on AOT binary induce crash #94650
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #94819
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 8.0.1
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #94818
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.15
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #94817
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.26
  • Enable dprintf logging for the whole GC #94816
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Unpin SdkVersionForWorkloadTesting like 'release/8.0' #94813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm64-sve
  • Add Monitor.WaitCount + EventCounter #94810
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support TimeSpan with RangeAttribute in Options validation source generator #94798
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Fix Vector512.CopyTo #94795
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Add empty SVE API for Arm64 #94791
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #94787
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Update System.Diagnostics.Metrics and System.Diagnostics.Activities ownership #94785
    area-Meta
  • Fix build issues with clang18 #94782
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the overwritten of reg21 when `pLookup->sizeOffset >2047` #94766
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • UnzipEven() and Count16BitElements() intrinsics for Arm64 SVE #94765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix declaration of DiagAddNewRegion #94759
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94757
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Remove exclusion for a test that seems to work #94756
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #94748
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94747
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #94746
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixed setting ReadMode to Message for NamedPipeClientStream on Windows #94742
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • [wasi] Run the mono runtime component selection logic for wasi #94738
    area-Build-mono
  • Pin to 8.0.100 #94815
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Disable Determinism test on NativeAOT iOS/tvOS runs #94793
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • update Alpine test images #94487
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Improve message when wasi-sdk is missing #94688
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix DescriptionNameTests.DumpRuntimeInformationToConsole failing on Mono on Windows #94788
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • JIT: enable complementary jtrue assertions for cross-block local ap #94741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94718
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94719
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-System.DateTime, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Optimize data flow used in assertion prop/CSE #94701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run CrossBlockLocalAssertionProp config #94783
    tenet-performance-benchmarks, area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps" #94807
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Implement emulate single step feature. #94711
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion #94613
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Calculate PackageVersionNet7 #94614
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Propagate value of PortableBuild property to Inner Source Build #94789
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] #ifdef out code that requires FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #94715
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Ensure that `JsonSerializerOptions.CacheContext` is a singleton. #94527
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [docs] Add Mono Library Mode and update Mono Profiled AOT #94578
    area-Build-mono
  • [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94710
    os-android, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Fix removal of unreachable BBJ_CALLFINALLY/BBJ_ALWAYS on Linux/arm #94751
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the help message in build.ps1 #92192
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update area tizen owners #94778
    area-Meta, os-tizen, community-contribution
  • Add support for specifying "experiment name". #94679
    tenet-performance-benchmarks, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update APICompat baseline version to 8.0.0 #94716
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94693
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add a warning to RD.XML docs #94752
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Char.IsAsciiLetterUpper comments #94740
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono-debug] refactor access to MonoDebugInformationEnc #94617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #94730
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #94729
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #94731
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Updated

  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94708
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94707
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94706
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • [wasi][wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage to the AppBuilders #94615
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize SSA #94672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][mono] imt vt_slot robustness #94705
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • try regMask to unsigned __int128 for linux/arm64 #94589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add etw event for Monitor.Wait #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add ConstructorBuilder implementation, integrate TypeBuilder.GetXyz() static methods #94732
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    no-recent-activity, needs-author-action, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Initial gcdump support #94673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
